mapper.select: SELECT DISTINCT VALUE1, VALUE1_KANJ FROM ORAUSR01.M_RDM_CODE_MST WHERE CODE_NAME ='REQ_KBN_LB' AND DEL_FLG = 0 AND NOT VALUE1 LIKE '%X%' ORDER BY VALUE1

SELECT DISTINCT VALUE1, VALUE1_KANJ FROM ORAUSR01.M_RDM_CODE_MST WHERE CODE_NAME ='REQ_KBN_LB' AND DEL_FLG = 0
AND (VALUE1 LIKE '0%' OR VALUE1 LIKE '1%' OR VALUE1 LIKE '2%')
AND (VALUE1 LIKE '3%' OR VALUE1 LIKE '4%' OR VALUE1 LIKE '5%')
AND NOT VALUE1 LIKE '%X%' ORDER BY VALUE1
